message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product for $1200000. This is a one-time offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $950000 for it.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1150000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still feel that $950000 is a fair price for the product. I would like to stick to that figure.
